Field 'paradigm' is required when the field 'purpose' is 'Process'. Valid values are: Waterfall, Rup

Review field 'source', valid values are: TestingFramework, IssueTracker, StaticAnalysis, ContinuousIntegration, Manual

Review field 'scale', valid values are: Nominal, Ordinal, Interval, Ratio
